article.description: — Makhi Mitchell recorded 11 points and 11 rebounds to carry Rhode Island to a 76-63 win over Seton Hall on Wednesday night.
article.headline: Mitchell leads Rhode Island past Seton Hall 76-63
article.linkText: Mitchell leads Rhode Island past Seton Hall 76-63
article.story: KINGSTON, R.I. -- — Makhi Mitchell recorded 11 points and 11 rebounds to carry Rhode Island to a 76-63 win over Seton Hall on Wednesday night. Fatts Russell had 17 points for Rhode Island (3-2). Jeremy Sheppard added 14 points. Ishmael Leggett had 11 points. Sandro Mamukelashvili had 25 points and 10 rebounds for the Pirates (1-2). Jared Rhoden added 10 points. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
